subject: Football
lead_paragraph: John Taylor, a defensive tackle for the semiprofessional Central Penn Piranha, is one of the largest players in the history of football, standing 6 feet 11 inches and weighing 500 pounds.
snippet: John Taylor, a defensive tackle for the semiprofessional Central Penn Piranha, is one of the largest players in the history of football, standing 6 feet 11 inches and weighing 500 pounds.
